DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to test whether Lixisenatide (AVE0010) restores first phase and improves second phase insulin response in subjects with diabetes mellitus type 2.
DOC.brief_title: Lixisenatide for Restoration of Insulin Release in Subjects With Diabetes Mellitus Type 2
